fc2b5d2d-b5a0-482b-b828-9905b995286f.description: Earners of this badge are able to relate a suggested experimental method to an experimental context. In doing so they describe the aspects of the context which would be measured according to the identified variables and make subsequent predictions of major outcomes by drawing on their knowledge of the context.
fc2b5d2d-b5a0-482b-b828-9905b995286f.name: Science Investigations: Contextualisation - Level 1

issuer.summary: issued by Korowa Anglican Girls’ School

badge_template_activities.title: Students will be awarded Contextualisation Level 1 when the following criteria are consistently demonstrated through educational artefacts and reflection: "Identifies the concepts which relate to the investigation context", "Relates predetermined variables to a real-world context", "Associates predetermined variables with aspects of an experiment", "Generally predicts the outcome of a significant trial"

fffca3b9-f918-4c63-9d46-85ebf04e24a8.description: Earners of this badge are able to organise the data they collect from an experiment in a tabulated and graphical form by representing their data in provided templates. They identify emerging patterns which they link to suggested concepts to begin to analyse what they observe.
fffca3b9-f918-4c63-9d46-85ebf04e24a8.name: Science Investigations: Data Representation and Analysis - Level 1

issuer.summary: issued by Korowa Anglican Girls’ School

badge_template_activities.title: Students will be awarded Data Representation and Analysis Level 1 when the following criteria are consistently demonstrated through educational artefact and reflection: "Transcribes raw data into a provided table", "Represents data diagrammatically", "Identifies patterns in the collected data", "Links identified patterns to context relevant concepts".

69bc723f-e82f-44d2-a86d-517c53566fae.description: Earners of this badge consider the observable trends in their measured data and use these to influence the structure of tables and graphical representations. In their articulation trends which link variables, earners make links to underpinning conceptual ideas.
69bc723f-e82f-44d2-a86d-517c53566fae.name: Science Investigations: Data Representation and Analysis - Level 2

issuer.summary: issued by Korowa Anglican Girls’ School

badge_template_activities.title: Students will be awarded Data Representation and Analysis Level 2 when the following criteria are consistently demonstrated through educational artefact and reflection: "Structures tables to communicate variable testing", "Accurately constructs graphical representations of data in specified forms", "Describes trends in data based on tabulated or graphical representations", "Explains the impact of the variables on each other with reference to contextually relevant concepts".

ae34acb2-eb3c-40c2-8341-af4ffe5f3449.description: Earners of this badge are able to critique and reflect on their implantation of an experimental method in order to identify aspects which were erroneously implemented due to the specificity of the instructions. They reflect on their experiment holistically to link their findings to its context.
ae34acb2-eb3c-40c2-8341-af4ffe5f3449.name: Science Investigations: Evaluation - Level 1

issuer.summary: issued by Korowa Anglican Girls’ School

badge_template_activities.title: Students will be awarded Evaluation Level 1 when the following criteria are consistently demonstrated through educational artefact and reflection: "Identifies aspects of a methodology performed incorrectly", "Identifies aspects of a methodology which are loosely defined", "Recalls the intent of the investigation".

011c3df1-038e-45b5-9118-c04e61417d1f.description: Earners of this badge consider their investigation more holistically to identify aspects of their designed method that introduce errors which affect precision or reliability, and suggest how they can be improved. The earner's evaluative capacity is demonstrated through reflective judgements of their hypothesis.
011c3df1-038e-45b5-9118-c04e61417d1f.name: Science Investigations: Evaluation - Level 2

issuer.summary: issued by Korowa Anglican Girls’ School

badge_template_activities.title: Students will be awarded Evaluation Level 2 when the following criteria are consistently demonstrated through educational artefact and reflection: "Identifies steps in a methodology which introduce random error", "Suggests modifications to specific steps which enhance precision or reliability", "Qualifies the correctness of the hypothesis".

9b9aeb63-a32f-4610-9b03-3a739c0e7c19.description: Earners of this badge are able to implement an experimental procedure based on common techniques they have utilised in previous experiments. They reflectively describe the main steps in the investigation and begin to consider factors which affect reliability and precision.
9b9aeb63-a32f-4610-9b03-3a739c0e7c19.name: Science Investigations: Experimental Design - Level 1

issuer.summary: issued by Korowa Anglican Girls’ School

badge_template_activities.title: Students will be awarded Experimental Design Level 1 when the following criteria are consistently demonstrated through educational artefacts and reflection: "Selects suggested or standard equipment", "Reflectively describes the main phases of a methodology", "Specifies methodological steps which require additional attention".
